maxResults.description: The maximum number of slot type versions to return in the response. The default is 10.

name.description: The name of the slot type for which versions should be returned.

nextToken.description: A pagination token for fetching the next page of slot type versions. If the response to this call is truncated, Amazon Lex returns a pagination token in the response. To fetch the next page of versions, specify the pagination token in the next request.
